remarks: Restricted existential quantification over the union of the range of a function.  Cf. ~ rexrn and ~ eluni2 .  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 19-Sep-2017.)
statement:
rexunirn.1 $e |- F = ( x e. A |-> B ) $.
rexunirn.2 $e |- ( x e. A -> B e. V ) $.
rexunirn $p |- ( E. x e. A E. y e. B ph -> E. y e. U. ran F ph ) $.
$d A y $.
$d F x $.
$d ph x $.
$d x y $.
